root.message: The UNIT_MEASURE field for indicator 2-1-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: The unit of the prevalence of undernourishment is percentage of the total population. A related indicator, the number of undernourished people, is measured as millions of people.
L'unité de la prévalence de la sous-alimentation est en pourcentage de la population totale. Un indicateur connexe, le nombre de personnes sous-alimentées, est mesuré en millions de personnes.
